contentList.content: Assume the shape of a venomous spider that can <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> with attacks and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ToxicSpit_VenomSpider">spit venom</LSTag> at enemies.

Assume the shape of a phase spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ToxicSpit_PhaseSpider_WSO">spit venom</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_EtherealJaunt_WSO">phase</LSTag> in and out of the Ethereal Plane.
Assume the shape of a giant wolf spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Enweb</LSTag> enemies.

Assume the shape of a giant spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Enweb</LSTag> enemies. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTOMBED">Cocoon</LSTag> enemies at level 10.

Assume the shape of a giant spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider">Enweb</LSTag> enemies. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTOMBED">Cocoon</LSTag> enemies at level 6.

Assume the shape of a hyena that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Becomes a stronger giant hyena at level 6, gaining the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies.

Assume the shape of a giant hyena that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Dire_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies at level 6.
Shapeshift into a Young Red Dragon.

Assume the shape of a wolf that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Becomes a stronger dire wolf at level 6, gaining the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies.

Assume the shape of a dire wolf that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PackHowl_Wolf_Dire_WSO">Incite</LSTag> allies and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Wolf_Dire_Lunging_Bite">Lunge</LSTag> at enemies, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Gains ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Wolf_Dire_Wildshape_Exposing_Bite">Distract</LSTag> enemies at level 6.
Bite a target and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> it.

Spit out a venomous missile that can damage multiple targets, and leaves a puddle of poison on hit. Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Becomes even more potent and can apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> at later levels (level 6 for moon druids / level 10 for other druids).

Spit out a venomous missile that can damage multiple targets and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> those it hits. Leaves a puddle of poison on hit. Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Spit out a venomous missile that can damage multiple targets and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> those it hits. Leaves a puddle of poison on hit.
Adds your Wisdom Modifier to the damage it deals, as your spellcasting ability makes poison more potent.
Bite a target and deal additional poison damage.
Phase in and out of the Ethereal Plane. Your movement on Ethereal Plane before coming back make it seem like teleport.
